author: Hemant Mehta
title: Sen. Bernie Sanders and Bill Nye Are Going to Have a Conversation About Climate Change on Facebook
text:
February 27, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
If the commenters on this site are any indication, this conversation about climate change between Sen. Bernie Sanders and Bill Nye is going to #BreakTheInternet . 
You’ll be able to watch the conversation live via Sanders’ Facebook page at 10:30a (ET). But don’t worry. If you miss it, Creationist Ken Ham will be calling attention to it for the rest of his life. 
Given the political environment we’re in, it’ll be nice to see facts and evidence take center stage for once. 
This also means you can finally make use of all your “Sanders/Nye 2020” signs.
